cause.description:
Canadians can show their support by:
- Wearing red on Fridays
- Writing to the troops on the Forces online message board : www.forces.gc.ca/site/Community/Messageboard/in...
- Buying the official "Support Our Troops" merchandise available at CANEX or online : https://www3.cfpsa.com/wyn/en/generalPublic/sho...
For you information, all proceeds from the sales of CFPSA "Support Our Troops" items are reinvested directly into morale and welfare programs for CF members and their families.
For more information on the "Support Our Troops" programs, visit : http://www.cfpsa.com/supportourtroops/
1. To show support to all elements of the armed forces...navy is just closer to home for me.
cause.name: Support Our Sailors
